#Configurable parameters should go here
#Following are the available options:

#Model: serial, mpi, hybrid
model: mpi

#minParallelDegree: positive numeric value
minParallelDeGREE: 5000

#Default persistent distribution type for input data
#persistent: distributed or broadcast
persistent: broadcast
#persistent: distributed

#Optimization Level: 1 for Serial MapReduce Agglomeration
optimize: 1
